name: Michigan
blurb: Coming back to Earth a bit but still look like the best team in this conference.

name: Purdue
blurb: Oscar Cluff's rise has coincided with the drop off in TKR's play. Something to monitor..

name: Illinois
blurb: How many teams don't start Big Z and play him 25+ minutes? Maybe 10?

name: Nebraska
blurb: Braden Frager has emerged as a potential third option scoring wise and that is a big development.

name: Michigan State
blurb: Monster game against Michigan coming soon..until then, time to beat up on the bad teams in the conference.

name: Iowa
blurb: The emergence of Tavion Banks is huge for a team that desperately needs a reliable second option.

name: Wisconsin
blurb: Nick Boyd has been hooping as of late.

name: UCLA
blurb: Will Mick Cronin ever get his guys to show up on the road?

name: Washington
blurb: Looking more an more like Danny Sprinkle is going to squander a really good roster.

name: Indiana
blurb: Indiana isn't so good that Tucker DeVries can disappear in conference games.

name: Ohio State
blurb: Christoph Tilly has been a major disappointment.

name: Minnesota
blurb: Niko Medved has a pesky little squad. Lack of depth hurts but they can pick off anybody at home.

name: USC
blurb: Muss couldn't get out of the state of Michigan fast enough.

name: Northwestern
blurb: The pieces around Nick Martinelli have not materialized and time is running out.

name: Oregon
blurb: Nate Bittle being out for pretty much the rest of the season is a blow below the waist.

name: Penn State
blurb: Didn't get the results they wanted recently but showed they will not get punked at home.

name: Rutgers
blurb: Steadied the ship a bit with two conference wins..does this buy Pikiell some time?

name: Maryland
blurb: Next years recruiting class can't come soon enough.
